titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of newspaper printing presses and components thereof.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of newspaper printing presses and components thereof.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of large newspaper printing presses and components from Tokyo Kikai Seisakusho, Ltd.
